comments:
1. I create a plugin project(named "justTest", other properties is default, the 
perspective is Plug-in Development), and then I close all the opened editor.
2. I open justTest\src\justTest\JustTestPlugin.java in JavaEditor, and then 
open then justTest\plugin.xml in ManifestEditor. 
3. I select the JavaEditor to make it active.
4. close the eclipse.
5. restart eclipse, the JustTestPlugin.java and plugin.xml are auto opened, the 
JustTestPlugin.java is active, and its editor is first editor.
6. close the justTest project in Package Exporer, it will auto close 
JustTestPlugin.java and plugin.xml, but when close plugin.xml file the error 
found. A Error Dialog will be shown and say "Unable to create part:justTest".
